name: Margarita
instructions: Combine tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Combine rum, lime juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint and lime juice in a highball glass. Add rum, top with soda water, and stir. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar cube with bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Add whiskey, stir with ice, and strain. Garnish with orange peel and cherry.

name: Negroni
instructions: Combine gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add Aperol, prosecco, and top with soda water. Garnish with an orange slice.
